query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.orderNumber,
  p.orderDate,
  p.invoiceDate,
  p.areaId,
  p.isExcluded,
  p.hospitalId,
  h.customerName as hospitalName,
  pm.id as pendingMatchId,
  pm.status as pendingMatchStatus
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id
LEFT JOIN pending_matches pm ON pm.purchaseId = p.id
WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000935'

  p.isExcluded,
  p.hospitalId,
  h.customerName as hospitalName,
  pm.id as pendingMatchId,
  pm.status as pendingMatchStatus
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id
LEFT JOIN pending_matches pm ON pm.purchaseId = p.id
WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000935'
